knimeNode.name: Node Factory Properties Extractor
knimeNode.shortDescription:
Extracts all node factory properties (e.g. node type) from all top-level nodes in this workflow (excluding this node, metanodes and components).
FOR TESTING PURPOSES ONLY! DO NOT USE!

fullDescription.intro:
Extracts all node factory properties (e.g. node type) from all top-level nodes in this workflow (excluding this node, metanodes and components). Those factory properties are either added programmatically (dynamic nodes) or defined in the respective *NodeFactory.xml (common native nodes). If a property to test is missing, just add it.
FOR TESTING PURPOSES ONLY! DO NOT USE!

ports.outPort: The table with the node description details per node.
